text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ahh... Aw man, they're all here...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
The guys from back home. Even<n>though it's only a school
event, it<n>looks like they've come all the way<n>here to cheer
me on...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
What's more, they're all<n>buddy-buddy now with the folks
from<n>the local shopping district sitting next<n>to them.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And their current topic of choice? Me.<n>They're getting on
like a house on<n>fire.
choice_data_list:
Sounds like the Nice Nature Fan Club is doing
well.

Sounds like the Nice Nature Fan Club is doing
well.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wha—et tu, Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh maaan, you better not haveany expectations!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In spite of what Nature said, I see a<n>flash of determination
cross her face<n>as she enters the gate.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And finally, the Tracen Meet kicks off!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bang!

text_block_list.name: Nature and Teio
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners have rounded the first<n>turn! In fourth—Nice
Nature! Trailing<n>behind in fifth by one and a half<n>lengths is
the fan favorite—Tokai Teio!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
(Ugh, I'm already feeling the<n>pressure! ...Even though I bet
Teio<n>isn't even trying to do so!)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: (But... I've got her exactly where I<n>want her!)

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Heh-heh... Time for me to go all-out!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
What's this? Tokai Teio is making<n>her move! She's blazing
past the<n>competition in an instant!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
(Not good—Teio's in the zone! If I<n>don't act now, she'll
leave me in the<n>dust!)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Tch!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Nice Nature rejoins the pack, and<n>she's got her sights
locked on Tokai<n>Teio! Now for the final turn...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Tokai Teio! Tokai Teio leads the pack!<n>Nice Nature in third!
She's speeding up<n>and giving fierce chase!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Aaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Tokai Teio, leading by two lengths!<n>Wait, make that two and
half—now<n>three! There's no stopping her now...<n>and she's
past the winning post!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Tokai Teio claims first place with a<n>flashy finish!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Ugh...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Aw, I got real close today!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Well, third place isn't bad, right?<n>Nothing to get down in the
dumps<n>about.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
If anything, I'd say this is perfect for<n>me. Yup, yup, this is
just right.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Really... this is my limit, that's all—

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: Sorry to interrupt. Is Nature here by<n>any chance?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh? Y-yeah, why? You need<n>something from me?

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: There was a delivery for you. Mind if<n>I drop it off here?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The teacher brings in a large box.<n>Opening it, we find the box
filled to the<n>brim with letters addressed to Nice<n>Nature.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: "Dear Natie..."

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"You were great in today's race, as<n>usual. It's a shame
how it ended, but<n>to us, seeing you run is already more<n>
than we could ever ask for."

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"Even when you're not here with us,<n>talking about you
always puts big ol'<n>smiles on our faces."

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"Meeting you and watching you grow<n>into such a fine
Umamusume has<n>been the pleasure of our lives."

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"We'll always be cheering you on, so<n>don't forget to cheer
yourself on too."

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What's... up with that?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What... What are they talking about?<n>Smiles? Me? I'm not—
choice_data_list: In their eyes, you shined the brightest.
In their eyes, you shined the brightest.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Aaaaargh! Augh! Ah, ngh!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: D... dammit! Dammit, dammit, damn it!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What's up with me and third?! Every!<n>Single! Time!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I tried my best? It was close? It<n>wasn't that bad? There's
no way that<n>third's all I'm good for!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I kept taking the easy way out, telling<n>myself that I wasn't
built for it, that I<n>was an extra! Wallowing in self pity<n>to
protect my petty pride!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I didn't want to be disappointed—I<n>didn't want to
disappoint... I was<n>afraid of getting hurt again, so I tried<n>to
make everyone give up on me!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But... but still!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I don't want things to end like this.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Everyone's cheering me on.Everyone's telling me that even Ideserve to dream. That's why...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I... want to make them proud. I want<n>them to see me shine!
choice_data_list: I've been waiting to hear you say that.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ugh... Ah, wait, um...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Agh... Gotta stop giving myself a way<n>out. Once I start going
down that<n>slippery slope...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for being all wishy-washy. It'll<n>take some time before
I can muster up<n>the courage to be more confident.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But... well, you know. If you're still<n>fine with training me,
then—
choice_data_list: Alright, let's keep on giving it our best then!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah... You got it, Trainer!
